bestseller.title: Caprese Gourmet Pizza
bestseller.desc: The goodness of basil leaves, cherry tomatoes and delightful bocconcini cheese make this the perfect pizza. What’s even better is that you get  a condiment box to create magic to our pizza!

bestseller.title: Primavera Gourmet Pizza
bestseller.desc: For the veggie gourmet lovers. Succulent zucchini, fresh red & yellow bellpeppers and grilled mushrooms on a thin crust base with Italian sauce & bocconcini cheese to relish. And there's a special ingredient box to add to the experience!

bestseller.title: Al Fungi Gourmet Pizza
bestseller.desc: The quintessential mushroom pizza on a cheesy mozzarella base, and with a twist of jalapenos & cherry tomatoes to create a new flavour dimension. And add your magic with our condiment box!

bestseller.title: Chicken Pepperoni Gourmet Pizza
bestseller.desc: The classic Italian pizza! Hand tossed thin crust pizza with Italian Sauce, bocconcini cheese and chicken pepperoni. You can add your magic to this evergreen classic with our special ingredient box!

bestseller.title: Burrata Pesto Gourmet Pizza
bestseller.desc: The one and only! Enjoy an out of the world cheese experience with 4 different types of cheese- Bocconcini, Parmesan, Mozzarella & the creamy Burrata! Don’t forget to add your magic with our special ingredient box!

bestseller.title: The 5 Cheese Gourmet Pizza
bestseller.desc: The Gourmet Pizza for cheese lovers. Loaded with 5 different types of cheese including fresh bocconcini, parmesan, mozzarella, orange cheddar and spicy ghost pepper, this is cheese indulgence. There’s our condiment box to add your magic to this cheesy goodness.

bestseller.title: Paneer Paratha Pizza
bestseller.desc: An epic fusion of paratha and pizza with melting cheese & soft paneer fillings to satisfy all your indulgent cravings

bestseller.title: Chicken Keema Paratha Pizza
bestseller.desc: Flavourful & meaty chicken keema paratha and goodness of cheesy pizza coming together in an epic crossover!

bestseller.desc: Classic delight with 100% real mozzarella cheese
